attributes.action: reject any attempt to restrict people's own choice about what sort of car they drive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People save for many years to buy a new car. They should be allowed to buy what they want, yet I see petitions here asking for restrictions on certain types of vehicles. There is no logic in banning 4 x 4s. People who need those vehicles would then have to buy a car AND a van, thus two vehicles instead of one.
Imposing ever more restrictions on what people can do with what is left of their income after taxation is certainly not an improvement in "quality of life".
